description: Provides information about the status of network interfaces on the attached device.

commands.name: az sphere device network disable
commands.summary: Disable a network interface on the attached device.
examples: az sphere device network disable --interface eth0

commands.name: az sphere device network enable
commands.summary: Enable a network interface on the attached device.
examples: az sphere device network enable --interface eth0

commands.name: az sphere device network list-firewall-rules
commands.summary: List firewall rules for the attached device.

commands.name: az sphere device network list-interfaces
commands.summary: List the network interfaces for the attached device.

commands.name: az sphere device network show-diagnostics
commands.summary: Show diagnostics for one or all Wi-Fi networks on the attached device.

commands.name: az sphere device network show-status
commands.summary: Show the network status for the attached device.

commands.name: az sphere device network update-interface
commands.summary: Update the network interface configuration for the attached device.
examples: az sphere device network update-interface --interface eth0 --hardware-address aa:bb:33:dd:ee:ff
